# <a name="advanced-outlookcom-security-for-microsoft-365-subscribers"></a><span data-ttu-id="ce632-102">Avancerad Outlook.com säkerhet för Microsoft 365-prenumeranter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce632-102">Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce632-103">Alla Outlook.com-användare har nytta av skräp post och filtrering av skadliga program.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce632-103">All Outlook.com users benefit from spam and malware filtering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce632-104">För Office 365 hem-och Office 365-privata prenumeranter utför Outlook.com extra kontroll av bifogade filer och länkar i meddelanden som du tar emot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce632-104">For Office 365 Home and Office 365 Personal subscribers, Outlook.com performs extra screening of attachments and links in messages you receive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ce632-105">Mer information finns i [avancerad Outlook.com-säkerhet för Microsoft 365-prenumeranter](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce632-105">To learn more, read [Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ce632-106">Om du vill aktivera eller inaktivera Safe Links går du till dina [premie säkerhets inställningar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ce632-106">To turn on or turn off Safe Links, go to your [Premium Security settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
